author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Shree Pattatharasiamman Temple : Thiruppavai chant, Kasturipalayam Road, Periyanayakanpalayam, 5 a.m.

Thiruvenkatavan Charitable Society: Margazhi Mahotsavam, Sri Venugopalaswamy and Sri KalyanaVenkatesa Perumal Swamy temple, 5.20 a.m.

Bakthi Sorpozhivu Mandram: Villibharatham Discourse, Kongu Nadu Arts and Science College, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Amrithavarshini Fine Arts: Carnatic vocal recital, Hotel Midland Residency, 4.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Dr. N.G.P. College of Arts and Science NSS unit: Camping, Kalapatti, Veeriampalayam and Karupparayanpalayam, 9 a.m.

Dr. R.V. Arts and Science College: Tamil association meeting, Seminar hall, 3 p.m.

Dr. N.G.P. College of Arts and Science: Guest lecture, Conference hall.

Tamil Nadu Agricultural University: Farmer’s day function, Convocation hall, 9.30 a.m.

Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan School: Kinter Garten & primary day, School premises, 5.30 p.m.

The Coimbatore productivity council: Food safety management systems, Vyshnav buildings, Race course, 9.30 a.m.

Rajasthani Sangh : Dengu preventive medicine, R.S.Puram, 2.30. p.m.

Nature Conservation Society: State level wildlife photography exhibition and workshop, P.K.Das Auditorium, Nehru Arts and Science College, 10.30 a.m.

MSME Development Institute and COTMA: National level vendor development programme, Suguna Kalyana Mandapam, 11 a.m.

Avinashilingam Educational Trust: Annai Vizha, Thiruchitrambalam Auditiroum, 6 a.m.

Dr. N.G.P. College of Arts and Science: Self defence training, Conference hall, 10 a.m.

Sri Ramakarisna Polytechnic college: NSS camp, Sri Aranganathar temple, 4 p.m.

The Coimbatore District Small Industries Association: Counselling and Guidance to Entrepreneurs, 3 p.m.

Sankara Institute of Management Science: Get invigorated session, SIMS Elite hall, 10.30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
